> [{quoted}](name=Jikker,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=mM7IRfAA,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2017-06-21T13:50:55.998+0000)
>
> I don't really care for the eSport skins

The old ones were shit but the ones for last season that they're about to release are sick AF, you should check out the video Riot put up recently showing their new approach to the World's E-sports skins; they're going with a high fantasy route with each player getting to pick their design.
the old ones werent that bad. ssg talon for instance, pretty awesome.

> [{quoted}](name=B1GST0NE,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=mM7IRfAA,comment-id=00050000000000010000,timestamp=2017-06-22T06:57:51.345+0000)
>
> the old ones werent that bad. ssg talon for instance, pretty awesome.

Most of the esports skins are basically just the classic with a white model, including Talon's, that's why so few people get the esports skins, they just aren't worth the price especially for a legacy, you'd get more from most normal 975 skins and unlike a legacy they can go on sale.
You say that now and then bam new skins next patch
Mehh, another month of bad skin sales.
Exactly!

I have a list of skins that i want and it is like 5 months old. I have gotten some of the skins I wanted. But I am still waiting for a skin for Viktor, Kled, Rumble,(and I really want wonderland Annie). But the wait continues.
And the shadow banning of Cosmic Kassadin from sales continues...
ya this is actually ridiculous....
I hear ya, I want Spirit Fire Brand, who was released about the same time 2 years ago.

No Spirit Fire Brand! No GraveLord Azir! No Snowday Bard! No Kindred! No Illaoi! No Jhin!

They keep recycling old stuff and aren't putting anything new on sale. Rito please!!!!!
the snowday skins are only available during the holiday season
Snow day Bard isn't legacy
Those are all 1350 skins, of which only two go on sale per month. Anything in that tier is going to take some patience.

Every Monday a 1350 skin goes on sale so they've got 4 slots for 1350 skins.

They can easily put up two 1350 skins on sale which have yet to make an appearance in a weekly sale. For the other two 1350 slots put up skins that have previously appeared on sale so that if someone wants they can get it.

But they won't because it's rito doing rito things.
did you guys forget about the existence of Cosmic Reaver Kassadin? It has literally not gone on sale for like 2 full years...?
I'm happy for Popstar Chroma sales but... I want IP sale for those.
when is skt1 lee coming
never

Choochoo Mecha Sion getting discounted any time soon?
Want it. But not enough to pay full price.
Unfortunately, Legendary (1820) and Ultimate (3250) skins are not a part of the sale rotation.
No, I bought Mecha Sion discounted, when it was his turn.
No you bought it during his Early sale for 1350 like I did, that was the first and last time he was on sale. He is not on the monthly 50% off rotation, no legendary or ultimate skin is.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/04/mecha-zero-sion-now-available.html

Released in April 2016.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/october-sales-schedule-0

Purchased in October 2016.

> [{quoted}](name=Keeman45,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=mM7IRfAA,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-21T19:30:28.830+0000)

> http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/october-sales-schedule-0
> 
> Purchased in October 2016.

Yes, that's exactly what I just said, Legendary Skins like Mecha Zero Sion only come on sale the one time for their Early Sale. MZS's only discount was just to 1350 and not a full 50% off. I got him the same way because they never come on sale again after that.

Legendary skins and ultimate are put up  for early sale once atleast six months after their debut. Then they never go on sale again.

Unfortunately Mecha Sion has already had this turn so you just gotta buy him at full price.

> [{quoted}](name=Doctor Tork,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=mM7IRfAA,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2017-06-20T23:07:54.006+0000)

Thanks. Too bad you can't exchange skin-shards. Recently got Pulsefire Cait. As a Toplane Tank main....

Even if they removed chromas from early sale they wouldn't put more skins in. It's more like a bonus. Also, 400 rp is quite a lot for just a recolor of a skin/champion, with maybe slight texture changes for a few of them.

Can someone tell me if the early sales happened already I want two Popstar ahri chromas but Im not sure if it happened already. (way to go rito "early sales")
should atleast be early.

add taliyah to that list, and ill agree

well i main taliyah and couldnt wait for the luxury of having a sale on her, so i bought her with RP straight up, as well as the freljord skin since i dont see them going on sake anytime soon, might go buy camille and rakan with rp again if they arent on the september sales list. i checked the august list, none of them were on it ;-;
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Why buy champs with rp? Just farm ip then buy skins. That's what I did. Farm ip till I had enough. I can never decide which champs to buy, so I always have extra ip anyway. Just want freljord taliyah to be on sale

there should be a Chroma IP sale coming up soon.
Was actually going to buy arctic ops {{champion:110}} at full price. Appreciate riot for these things, they're always trying to make it easier to get skins :D
